DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of a wound care debridement product and a moisturizer on sacral pressure ulcer wounds
DOC.brief_title: Wound Management for Sacral Pressure Ulcers With Necrotic Tissue
DOC.detailed_description: Pressure ulcers on the sacral area will be applied with either a wound debridement product or a wound moisturizer product plus a gentle wound dressing to manage wound closure over a 2-3 week period of treatment.
DOC.criteria: Male or female subjects of any age Sacral wounds with necrotic tissue 3rd degree burns know hypersensitivity to products
